product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Crew Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Working up a sweat in cold weather? Wearing a warm, wicking base layer like the REI Midweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) Crew can make the difference between days to remember and ones to forget. Polartec Power Dry uses 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. Combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. 30 UPF sun protection. Soft, non-chafing flatseam construction; raglan shoulder seams are comfortable under pack straps. Underarm and side gussets promote freedom of motion. Longer length helps top stay tucked in; smooth outer fabric eases layering. The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Crew Shirt features a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
